meanings.sent1: Wearing a swimsuit in the snow is impractical.
meanings.sent2: It is impractical to expect a cat to bark like a dog.
meanings.sent3: Trying to fit an elephant in a suitcase would be impractical.
meanings.sent4: Her dream of flying without wings was as impractical as a fish climbing a tree.
meanings.sent5: The idea of living on the moon seemed as impractical as trying to catch the wind.

meanings.definition: Not suitable for a particular purpose
meanings.sent1: Using a fork to eat soup is impractical.
meanings.sent2: A raincoat made of paper would be impractical in a storm.
meanings.sent3: Trying to use a toothbrush to comb your hair would be quite impractical.
meanings.sent4: His plan to build a boat out of sand was as impractical as trying to hold water in a sieve.
meanings.sent5: The idea of using a candle to light up a football stadium is as impractical as it gets.

meanings.definition: Not capable of being put into practice
meanings.sent1: Her idea of time travel using a cardboard box is impractical.
meanings.sent2: It is impractical to try to grow a garden in a desert.
meanings.sent3: Attempting to build a house of cards on a windy day would be impractical.
meanings.sent4: His plan to teach a fish to ride a bicycle was as impractical as painting a rainbow without colors.
meanings.sent5: The concept of teleporting without a machine is as impractical as trying to hold a cloud in your hand.
